sentences.sContent: I'm afraid I can't shoulder such a responsibility.
sentences.sCn: 我怕背不起这样的责任。

sentences.sContent: I'm afraid I'll be tied up until 7 o'clock.;I'm afraid I won't be free until 7 o'clock.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'm afraid I'll be tied up until 7 o'clock.;I'm afraid I won't be free until 7 o'clock.
sentences.sCn: 我七点钟以前恐怕抽不出身来。

trans.tranCn: [口] 恐怕（用于礼貌地拒绝）
